title: pashupatIshvaram
sahitya:
pashupatIshvaram praNaumi satatam pAlita bhaktam sadA bhajEham


anupallavi

 pashcima kAshmira rAja vinutam pannagA bharaNa dharam su-shObitam


caraNam   pAkashAsanAdi dEva brndam pancAnanam praNata muni brndam 
parashiva tatva bOdhitAnandam vara guruguhanutam sOmAskadam 
shOkaharam shubha phalaprada karam parashu mrgadharam shUlAdi dharam 
shuka shaunakAdi ghOSita shiva pantuvarAli rAgapriyam ati caturam
